VacuumdConfiguration.statement: DELETE FROM events WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT svclosteventid FROM outages WHERE svclosteventid = events.eventid UNION SELECT svcregainedeventid FROM outages WHERE svcregainedeventid = events.eventid UNION SELECT eventid FROM notifications WHERE eventid = events.eventid) AND eventtime < now() - interval '6 weeks';

trigger.name: selectSuspectAlarms
trigger.statement: SELECT a.alarmid as _alarmid, a.eventuei as _eventuei, a.nodeid as _nodeid, a.ipaddr as _ipaddr, a.serviceid as _serviceid, s.servicename as _servicename, now() as _ts FROM alarms a LEFT OUTER JOIN service s ON s.serviceid = a.serviceid WHERE alarmType = 1 AND severity > 3 AND severity < 7 AND alarmacktime IS NULL AND COALESCE(lastautomationtime, lasteventtime) < now() - interval '60 minutes'

trigger.name: selectClearedAlarms
trigger.statement: SELECT a.alarmid as _id, e.eventseverity AS _sev, now() as _ts FROM alarms a JOIN events e ON e.eventid = a.lasteventid WHERE severity = 2 AND alarmtype = 1 AND a.lasteventtime > a.lastautomationtime

trigger.name: selectResolvers
trigger.statement: SELECT *, now() as _ts FROM alarms WHERE alarmType=2

action.name: escalateAlarm
resetSeverity
garbageCollect
action.statement: DELETE FROM alarms WHERE COALESCE(lastautomationtime, lasteventtime) < now() - interval '3 days' AND alarmacktime IS NULL

action.name: fcGarbageCollect
action.statement: DELETE FROM alarms WHERE COALESCE(lastautomationtime, lasteventtime) < now() - interval '8 days'

action.name: deletePastClearedAlarms
action.statement: DELETE from alarms WHERE severity <= 3 AND COALESCE(lastautomationtime, lasteventtime) < now() - interval '2 minutes' AND alarmacktime IS NULL

action.name: deleteAllPastClearedAlarms
action.statement: DELETE from alarms WHERE severity <= 3 AND COALESCE(lastautomationtime, lasteventtime) < now() - interval '24 hours'

action.name: clearProblems
deletePurgeableStatisticsReports
action.statement: DELETE from statisticsReport WHERE purgeDate < now()
